<PADM>右スティックで規定コマンド入力<KEYM>マウス移動で規定コマンド入力</KEYM>
column4:
During a chant, switch to glyph
input mode with <KC CHANGE_MODE>.
Input the shown glyph with <PADM>the right
stick<KEYM>mouse movement</KEYM>.

column3: <KC AVOID>を押す
column4: Press <KC AVOID>.

column3: 空中で<KC JUMP>を押す
column4: While in the air, press <KC JUMP>.

column3: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
column4:
While climbing an enemy,
press <KC ATTACK1>.

column3:
大剣で斬りつける
攻撃を当てることで連続斬りが可能
column4:
Deliver slashes with a large sword.
Landing the first hit will allow further
consecutive slashes.

column3:
大剣で広範囲に対して斬撃を放つ
攻撃を当てることで連続斬りが可能
column4:
Deliver slashes over a wide area with a large
sword.
Landing the first hit will allow further
consecutive slashes.

column3:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
<COL ffdc78>LV UPでさらに攻撃威力が上昇する
＜真・魔人斬り＞に進化</COL>
column4:
Channel energy into the blade, and slam it down.
When the button is released the moment the charge
finishes, the damage
increases significantly.
Increases in damage as the Revenge Gauge rises.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill.
Becomes (Indomitable Lash).</COL>

column3:
振り上げた大剣に力を溜め、渾身の力で振り下ろす
溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇
リベンジゲージ蓄積量に応じて、さらに威力が増加
column4:
Channel energy into the blade, and slam it down
with
the force of the entire body. When the button is
released the moment the charge
finishes, the damage increases significantly.
Increases in damage as the Revenge Gauge rises.

column3:
身を固め、敵の攻撃に耐える
攻撃を受けとめるとリベンジゲージが増加する
column4:
Steel yourself, and endure an enemy's attack.
Increases the Revenge Gauge a bit when hit by an
attack.

column3:
腰を落とした姿勢で構え、
近接してきた仲間を上方に放りあげる
column4:
Hold yourself in a crouched position, and toss
nearby allies into the air.

column3: 空中で大剣の一撃を振るう
column4: Deliver slashes with the blade while in the air.

column3:
空中から多段ヒット性能を持つ振り下ろし攻撃を放つ
高所から行うことで威力が上昇する
column4:
Slam the blade downward while in the air,
delivering multiple hits.
Damage rises when performed from high altitudes.

column3: 転倒を回避し体勢を立て直す
column4: Recover from being knocked away while in the air.

column3:
しがみついた状態から力を溜め、
破壊力のある一撃を放つ
column4:
While clinging to an enemy, the user readies the
blade briefly, and delivers a single devastating
blow.

column3: <KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
column4: Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>.

column3: <KC ATTACK1>後、少し遅らせて<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
column4:
After <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment then
repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>.

column3: <KC ATTACK2>長押し後、離すと発動
column4: Hold <KC ATTACK2> for a moment then release.

column3: <KC ATTACK2>長押し後、離すと発動
column4: Hold <KC ATTACK2> for a moment then release.

column3: <KC AVOID>を押す
column4: Press <KC AVOID>.

column3: <KC CATAPULT>を押す
column4: Press <KC CATAPULT>.

column3: 空中で<KC ATTACK1>を押す
column4: While in the air, press <KC ATTACK1>.

column3: 空中で<KC ATTACK2>を押す
column4: While in the air, press <KC ATTACK2>.

column3: 吹き飛ばされ中に<KC JUMP>を押す
column4: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>.

column3: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>長押し後、離すと発動
column4:
While climbing an enemy,
hold <KC ATTACK1> for a moment then release.

column3:
闘波の矢を生成し、魔道弓を前方に向けて構える
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Hold the Magick Bow forward, and create Seeker
Arrows.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
魔道弓を敵に向け、対象を捉える
捉える敵が多いほど、闘波の矢の威力上昇速度が
速くなる。空中でも発動可能
column4:
Face the Magick Bow towards the enemy, and
capture them within its sights. The more enemies
that are targeted,
the higher the rate at which the Seeker Arrow
charges.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
捉えた敵に向けて闘波の矢を放ち、攻撃を与える
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Fire the Seeker Arrow towards the
targeted enemy.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
闘波の矢の威力を強化する
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Increases damage of the Seeker Arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
助真の矢を生成し、魔道弓を前方に向けて構える
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Hold the Magick Bow forward, and create True Aid
Arrows.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
魔道弓を味方に向け、対象を捉える
捉える味方が多いほど、助真の矢の回復力
上昇速度が速くなる。空中でも発動可能
column4:
Face the Magick Bow towards an ally, and
capture them within its sights. The more allies
that are targeted,
the higher the rate at which the True Aid Arrow
charges.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
捉えた味方に向けて助真の矢を放ち、味方の傷を癒す
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Fire the True Aid Arrow at a targeted ally
and heal their wounds.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
助真の矢の威力を強化する
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Enhances the recovery power of the True Aid Arrow.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
前方に蹴りを放つ
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Kick forward.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
自身の傷を癒す
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Heal your wounds.
Can be activated even while in the air.

column3:
照準をより多数の目標に合わせ、狙いを定める
空中でも発動可能
column4:
Increase the maximum number of targets
that can be locked on while aiming.
Can be activated even while in the air.
